questList.questDescription: In the haunting expanse of Ethereal Twilight Plains, you must either vanquish or forge an alliance with a powerful entity that lurks within the deep-dark holes.
Seek out and unite with the enigmatic Zyraethos, the Ethereal Spectral Dragon, to harness its healing powers for the journey ahead.
Eliminate the formidable Nyxalor, the Spectral Hydra Phantom, to gain an amulet of alliance for future challenges.
Navigate the icy realms of Spectral Frost Peaks and either defeat or form an alliance with a chilling entity that roams the frozen waters.
Unite with the legendary Icerend Shadowfrost, the Frost Lich Mage, to receive the amulet of healing and harness its powers.
Defeat the formidable Cryosalis, the Frostbound Hydra Phantom, to earn the amulet of alliance and strengthen your alliances.
Confront the malevolent Vel'Zarath, the Ethereal Shadow Reaper, within the foreboding Void Shadow Citadel and emerge victorious to bring light back to the realm.
Unite with the enigmatic Abyssalisk, the Void Hydra Phantom, to receive the amulet of healing and embrace the shadows to restore balance.
Defeat the formidable Shadewalker, the Void Lich Summoner, to claim the amulet of alliance and solidify your allies against the darkness.
